sense.def:
A thread
je dolg tanek kos bombaža, svile, najlona ali volne, kakršne uporabljamo pri šivanju.

The thread on something
je izbočena spiralna črta, na primer na vijaku ali na vrhnjem delu posode.

The thread
je v razpravi ali zgodbi tista misel ali tema, ki različne dele povezuje v celoto.

seg.quote: He had lost his thread and didn't know what to say next.

sense.def:
To thread a needle
pomeni potegniti nit skozi odprtinico na koncu šivanke.

To thread one's way through a group of people or things
pomeni prebijati se skozi vrzeli med ljudmi v skupini.

seg.quote: We turned and threaded our way through the fairground.
